name: Number 32
description:

This was a fun experiment to try and limit myself to use only one of everything. I had very limited time for this jam so I wanted to do something different.




How To Play : 

- Any button to change rotation 
- Hit the obstacles with the tip of the triangle

Made for GMTK Jam 2019.
